title: fix: add SSE support for api.airforce video models + disable grok-video
author: voodoohop

gist.summary: Implemented SSE streaming support for api.airforce video models to resolve generation errors and improve stability.
gist.impact: Video generation is now more robust, with the unstable grok-video model temporarily paused to ensure consistent performance.
gist.visual_concept: The Pollinations bee as a projectionist in a cozy booth, fixing a vintage film projector that is streaming light smoothly. A film reel labeled 'Grok' is set aside on a shelf.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the Pollinations bee inside a retro projection booth fixing a vintage film projector. The projector beams a steady stream of soft lime green light (#ecf874). A film reel labeled 'Grok' sits on a nearby shelf. Warm lighting, pastel gradients, lo-fi aesthetic like Stardew Valley. Nostalgic but beautiful.

image.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the Pollinations bee inside a retro projection booth fixing a vintage film projector. The projector beams a steady stream of soft lime green light (#ecf874). A film reel labeled 'Grok' sits on a nearby shelf. Warm lighting, pastel gradients, lo-fi aesthetic like Stardew Valley. Nostalgic but beautiful.
